title: Validation, feature selection, interpretation etc
description: General informationIn this kernel I focus on various ML approaches:  adversarial validation for selecting stable features; comparing several validation schemes; trying several different models to find which ones are better for this competition; some approaches to feature selection and model interpretation.   Work in progress
